The Making of Another Major Motion Picture Masterpiece is a 2023 novel by actor and writer Tom Hanks.
Plot
Development
Publication history
Audiobook
An audiobook edition of the novel was published in May 2023 by Penguin Random House Audio. In 2024, it was nominated for the Audie Award for Literary Fiction & Classics at the 29th Audie Awards.
The audiobook is narrated by Hanks, along with a full cast including:
* Rita Wilson as Dr Patrice Johnson
* Peter Gerety as Kenny Sheprock
* Natalie Morales as Ynez Gonzalez-Cruz
* Ego Nwodim as Al Mac-Teer
* Nasim Pedrad as Wren Lane
* Connor Ratliff as Ike Clipper
* Holland Taylor as Dace Mills
The voice cast also includes Frankie Corzo, Hillary Huber, David Lee Huynh, Sean Patrick Hopkins, JD Jackson, January LaVoy, and Oliver Wyman.
